Package org.apache.bookkeeper.client

Class LedgerOpenOp

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.bookkeeper.client.LedgerOpenOp
  • class LedgerOpenOp
extends java.lang.Object
    Encapsulates the ledger open operation.
